QuickStartEmbed.Title: TaylorBot Quick Start Guide
QuickStartEmbed.Description: Thank you for inviting me! Here's a few tips to start. 😊

Fields.Name: Prefix
Fields.Value: My default prefix is `!`, which means I will only answer to commands starting with it. To change it, server managers can use the `setprefix` command. ❕

Fields.Name: Spam Channels
Fields.Value: If you have any commands/bots channels, please use the `addspamchannel` command in each of them! 🤖

Fields.Name: More Help
Fields.Value: Looking for help or have more questions? Use the `help` command or [click here to join the TaylorBot server](https://discord.gg/3qVNd5P). 📖
